SELECT t.*, (SELECT NAME FROM t_member WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id = t.member_id ) AS shopMember , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_shop_member WHERE shop_id=t.id) AS staffNum, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_cars WHERE shop_id=t.id) AS shopCarNum, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_shop_allied WHERE allied_status=2 and (shop_id=t.id OR allied_shop_id=t.id) ) AS alliedNum, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_cars WHERE shop_id=t.id) AS shopCarNum, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_shop_allied a,t_cars c WHERE c.status=1 and a.is_deleted = 0 and a.allied_status=2 and c.is_deleted = 0 and c.audit_status=2 AND (a.shop_id=t.id OR a.allied_shop_id=t.id) AND (c.shop_id=a.shop_id OR c.shop_id=a.allied_shop_id)) AS alliedCarNum FROM t_shop t, t_shop_member s WHERE t.is_deleted = 0 AND s.is_deleted = 0 AND t.id=s.`shop_id`
and s.staff_id=#{memberId}

SELECT t.*, (SELECT NAME FROM t_member WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id = t.member_id ) AS shopMember , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_shop_member WHERE shop_id=t.id) AS staffNum, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_cars WHERE is_deleted = 0 and audit_status=2 and shop_id=t.id) AS shopCarNum, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_shop_allied WHERE is_deleted = 0 and allied_status=2 and (shop_id=t.id OR allied_shop_id=t.id) ) AS alliedNum, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_shop_allied a,t_cars c WHERE c.status=1 and a.is_deleted = 0 and a.allied_status=2 and c.is_deleted = 0 and c.audit_status=2 AND (a.shop_id=t.id OR a.allied_shop_id=t.id) AND (c.shop_id=a.shop_id OR c.shop_id=a.allied_shop_id)) AS alliedCarNum FROM t_shop t WHERE t.is_deleted = 0
and t.id=#{id}
